climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 36 Mega Rolls of Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper (2 packs of 18), 1-ply, 425 sheets per roll—packaging may vary from images shown.
3x stronger than the leading bargain brand, Scott ComfortPlus 1-ply toilet paper breaks down 6x faster* and is sewer-safe, septic-safe and clog-free.
60% More Sheets vs Bear Brand Mega Roll, so you can change rolls less often.
Free of perfumes or scents, so no need to worry about allergies or irritation.
Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue.
body.description: Discover comfort and clean you can trust with Scott ComfortPlus toilet tissue rolls: 1-layer toilet paper that offers everyday comfort plus reliable strength. With Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper, you get 36 Mega Rolls of 425 sheets, so you have plenty of toilet paper for you and your loved ones. 3x stronger than the leading bargain brand, Scott ComfortPlus breaks down 6x faster vs the leading brand one ply and is sewer-safe, septic-safe and clog-free. And here’s one more reason why Scott ComfortPlus toilet paper is the perfect addition to your household supplies: Our 1-ply toilet tissue paper combines just the right amount of softness and strength by featuring thick and plush sheets for a trusted, comforting clean. We’ve been trusted for generations: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue. Keep life rolling by ordering Scott ComfortPlus in bulk online! * vs the leading brand one ply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unveiling True Comfort: Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper - The Mega Roll Marvel
reviews.reviewText: In a world where comfort reigns supreme, finding the perfect balance between luxury and practicality is key, especially when it comes to everyday essentials like toilet paper. Scott ComfortPlus, with its 36 Mega Rolls and 425 sheets per roll, stands as a testament to this delicate equilibrium. In this epic review, we venture into the realm of bathroom bliss to evaluate the plushness, durability, eco-friendliness, and overall experience that Scott ComfortPlus delivers.Plushness and Softness (4.8/5):Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper lives up to its name, providing a plush and soft experience with every use. The sheets are designed to be gentle on the skin, ensuring a comfortable wiping experience without any irritation. The extra cushioning truly sets it apart, making it feel like a treat for your delicate regions.Durability and Sheet Count (4.7/5):With an impressive 425 sheets per roll, Scott ComfortPlus Mega Rolls are designed for endurance. The sheets are sturdy and tear-resistant, allowing for efficient use without excessive wastage. The Mega Roll size ensures that you won't find yourself replacing the roll too frequently, adding to the convenience and value for money.Septic-Safe and Eco-Friendliness (4.6/5):Being septic-safe is a commendable feature, demonstrating Scott's commitment to environmental responsibility. The toilet paper dissolves easily, preventing any harm to septic systems or plumbing. Moreover, the brand is increasingly focusing on sustainability, using responsibly sourced materials and implementing eco-friendly manufacturing processes.Ease of Use and Packaging (4.8/5):The packaging of the Scott ComfortPlus Mega Rolls is user-friendly, making it effortless to store and dispense. The rolls fit most standard toilet paper holders, and the perforated sheets tear off cleanly without fuss. The packaging is robust, ensuring that the rolls remain intact during transit and storage.Value for Money (4.7/5):In terms of value for money, Scott ComfortPlus Mega Rolls shine. The generous sheet count and durability of each roll make it a cost-effective choice in the long run. The convenience of having to replace rolls less frequently adds to the overall value and practicality.Conclusion:Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper, boasting 36 Mega Rolls with 425 sheets per roll, proves to be a stellar choice for those seeking a harmonious blend of luxury and utility in their bathroom experiences. Its plushness, durability, septic-friendliness, and overall value make it a standout in the realm of toilet paper. Embrace the unparalleled comfort and reliability that Scott ComfortPlus offers, ensuring your bathroom moments are nothing short of pure indulgence. Welcome a new level of comfort into your daily routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I switched
reviews.reviewText: We use to get the 1000 sheet roll as we needed something that wouldn't clog the toilet and have to pay for a plumber to come out but that one just seemed to not be the same. It's almost as if they made it even thinner if that was possible. I switched their Comfort Plus and can tell it a whole lot better. It is thicker and softer than the 1000 sheet roll but still dissolves like the 1000 sheet roll so that there is no worries about having to call a plumber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best brand for your delicate parts.
reviews.reviewText: I love the Scotts brand. You do not need more than a few sheets to complete the job. After using Scotts, you walk away feeling fresh and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft and comfortable and lasts long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Toilet paper has good value. The sheets are a little thin and tear easily, so if you’re looking for something strong I would not recommend. Good for price though.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great texture compatible with septic tank
reviews.reviewText: Compatible with the septic tank don’t have to worry about clogging. Strong but gentle.
